RelatedSentence: WASHINGTON , May 18 , 2014 Â– In a statement issued today , Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel and his wife , Lilibet , offer their condolences on the passing of Laos Defense Minister Douangchay Phichit and his wife , Thanda Phichit .
Lilibet and I were deeply saddened to learn that Laos Defense Minister Douangchay Phichit and his wife , Thanda Phichit , were killed in a plane crash on Saturday , May 17th .
We had the pleasure of hosting Minister Douangchay and Madam Thanda Phichit at the U.S .
I appreciated the opportunity to work with the minister to help advance our two countries ' emerging defense relationship , and to strengthen the U.S .
